Release date
May 2024
Question asked
One of the requirements in the ESRS E2 Pollution Standard is to describe the phase-out of
substances of very high concern (SVHCs). How can undertakings identify SVHCs that are to be
phased out?
ESRS reference
ESRS E2 paragraph 6; Disclosure Requirement E2-1 paragraph 15 (b)
Key terms
Substances of very high concern; SVHCs
